meaningMnemonic: This <radical>net</radical> needs to be <radical>fix</radical>ed if you want to <kanji>put</kanji> food on the table.
readingMnemonic: Once it's fixed, you <kanji>put</kanji> a bunch of <reading>chee</reading>se (ち) in the net. You want to catch something that eats cheese, so that you can then put that animal on your dinner table.
